original_text: As the ark of the Lord came into the city of David, Michal the daughter of Saul looked out of the window and saw King David leaping and dancing before the Lord, and she despised him in her heart.
korean_text: 여호와의 궤가 다윗 성으로 들어올 때에 사울의 딸 미갈이 창으로 내다보다가 다윗 왕이 여호와 앞에서 뛰놀며 춤추는 것을 보고 심중에 그를 업신여기니라

sentences.original_text: As the ark of the Lord came into the city of David
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 궤가 다윗 성으로 들어올 때에

sentences.original_text: Michal the daughter of Saul looked out of the window
and saw King David leaping and dancing before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주 앞에서 뛰고 춤추는 다윗 왕을 보았다

sentences.original_text: and she despised him in her heart.
